permission_error_file_url: To use Time Travel with local files, please enable "Allow access to file URLs" in the extension settings.
permission_error_extension_gallery: Time Travel cannot be used in the Chrome Web Store.
permission_error_generic: Time Travel cannot be used in the current tab.
permission_error_generic_with_message: Time Travel cannot be used in the current tab. Reason: {message}
permission_error_please_change_tab: Please switch to a different tab to change the time.
please_reload_message: Almost ready! Please reload the page to apply the changes.
dateformat_info: You can enter date and time in any format supported by Date.parse(), as well as UNIX timestamps:
date_input_hint:
You can also adjust time using arrow keys:
±1 min using Up/Down,
±10 min using Shift + Up/Down,
±1 h using Cmd/Ctrl + Up/Down,
±1 s using Alt + Up/Down
